physical_appearance: This is a beige embroidered robe. It has long sleeves and is flared towards the bottom. The collar buttons on the top-left corner, creating two oval openings. The fabric is made of a repeated geometric pattern.
sgcool_label_text: Robe or angarkha, a long tunic style top for men, with chikankari embroidery that is particularly associated with the Lucknow region. Most likely would have been used by the upper classes.
